name: Sisyphus - entry for SGJ #2015
description:
Game takes about 20-30 seconds to load, please be patient. If controls don't work, try fullscreen mode, in fullscreen they should work without any problems.

Use arrow keys to move. You can cheat a little with left shift: the player will move quicker.

Source code is available:
https://github.com/nadult/sisyphus
